cowSeva.title: Cow Seva
cowSeva.description: Cow protection and service is not just a religious duty but a scientific and ecological necessity. Our Gaushalas provide shelter, care, and love to hundreds of cows, ensuring they live a dignified life. Through your support, we can continue this noble mission of protecting and serving these divine beings.

cowDonation.title: Cow Donation
cowDonation.description: Support our Gaushala by donating for cow care. Your contribution helps us provide food, shelter, and medical care to our cows.

fodderDonation.title: Fodder Donation
fodderDonation.description: Contribute towards the daily feed requirements of our cows. Quality fodder ensures their health and well-being.

volunteer.title: Volunteer Service
volunteer.description: Join us in serving the cows directly. Your time and effort make a significant difference in their lives.

buyProducts.title: Buy Cow Products
buyProducts.description: Support our cause by purchasing pure and natural cow products. The proceeds help us maintain our Gaushala.

donate.title: Donate for Cows Today
donate.description: Serving mother cow is our religious and social duty. Become a part of this virtuous cause by contributing today.

cowSevaCollection.title: Cow Seva Collection
cowSevaCollection.description: Collection of works done in our gaushala

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: The purpose of forming the organization is to work for the welfare of the community and to assist people in need.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: An organization dedicated to community development
hero.imageAlt: Community gathering representing our values and traditions

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.description: The objective of establishing the organization is to work for the welfare of society and to provide assistance to people facing difficulties. In 2025, the organization's operational area is Gwalior and nearby cities, with the aim of expanding to major cities of Madhya Pradesh within the next year. Subsequently, the scope of work will be further extended to cover the entire state of Madhya Pradesh, and eventually, the entire country, to organize and unite the Gahoi community.

truth.title: Truth
truth.description: We walk the path of truth and treat everyone with honesty.

dharma.title: Dharma
dharma.description: We cherish and promote the values of Dharma.

service.title: Service
service.description: We consider it our duty to serve society and help everyone.

programs.title: Organization's Potential Annual Programs:
list: Career Counseling / Talent Recognition Ceremony - May/June
New Year Fun Fair Party - January/February

benefits.title: Perks of Being a Member
list: Coupons for 2 programs held in the year will be provided, which will include meal arrangements.
Free entry/guidance will be available for other programs/activities/seminars.
Members will receive discount offers on various products/services.
By participating in the organization's activities, there will be an opportunity to become a member of the committee/executive board based on performance in the following year.
Joining the organization provides a chance to establish yourself and grow your business.

responsibilities.title: Main Responsibilities Defined for 2025
list: Providing information about government schemes for the education of economically weaker children in society and providing financial assistance.
Organizing introduction meetings for the marriage of unmarried children in society.
Helping needy children get jobs through the industrialists of society. Additionally, any other responsibilities agreed upon by the executive.

cta.title: Join Us Today
cta.description: Contribute to the development of society and work with us to build a better tomorrow.

contact.subtitle: Connect with us and let's develop the society together

gotraAankna.aanknaImportanceDescription: Aankna is a unique identifier of our family identity. It strengthens our social structure.

about.title: About Our Community
about.description: Gahoi Samaj India emphasizes religious studies and spirituality for creating a refined and progressive society. We believe in contributing towards building a peaceful and enlightened society.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Inspiring achievements of our community members

story1.story: A beautiful couple formed through our community platform. Both families found perfect compatibility in values and aspirations.

story2.story: Met through our matrimonial meet and instantly connected on community values and modern outlook.

story3.story: Found each other through family references in our community. Their shared interest in social service brought them closer.

story4.story: Connected through our community's digital platform. Their journey from first meeting to marriage is truly inspiring.

cta.title: Share Your Story

stayConnected.description: Gahoi Shakti Jan Kalyan Samiti, religious studies and spirituality for creating a refined society for everyone. We believe in contributing most towards building a peaceful and enlightened society.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Gahoi Samaj
meta.description: Privacy Policy and data protection guidelines for Gahoi Samaj website users

privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website.

items.1: To provide community services and support
items.3: To organize community events and activities
items.4: To send important updates and notifications
items.5: To improve our website and services

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement strict security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

smsPermission.title: SMS and Communication Permissions
smsPermission.intro: We use SMS and other communication methods to keep you informed about important updates and services.

infoUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
infoUsage.intro: We use your information responsibly to provide and improve our community services.

items.1: To maintain and update your community membership profile
items.2: To send you important notifications about events and activities
items.3: To process and manage your participation in community programs
items.4: To improve our services and develop new features
items.5: To ensure the security and integrity of our platform

infoSharing.title: Information Sharing
infoSharing.intro: We are committed to protecting your privacy and only share information in specific circumstances.

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.content: We may share information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, as long as they agree to keep this information confidential.

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property.

policyUpdates.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the effective date.
